message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $95 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $85 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I can't go as low as $85, I'm willing to come down to $90. This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I can agree to purchase the product for $87.
